蜧蜧蜧

蜧字的基本解释

蜧
lì
古书上记载的一种能兴云雨的黑色神蛇。
大虾蟆。

蜧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《廣韻》郎計切，去霽，來。］
(1)传说中的神蛇。
(2)大蛤蟆。

蜧字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蜧； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1086第18
【唐韻】【韻會】?郞計切，音麗。【玉篇】神蛇也。【郭璞·江賦】神蜧蝹蜦以沈遊。【張景陽詩】黑蜧躍重淵。【註】《淮南子》曰：犧牛騂毛，宜於廟牲。其於致雨，不若黑蜧。高誘曰：黑蜧，蛇也，潛於神泉，能致雲雨。【柳宗元·祈晴文】誅黑蜧，抶隂蜧。　又【廣韻】大蝦蟇也。與蜦同。【說文】蜦或作蜧。註見蜦。

蜧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蜧字的起名意思

暂无。

Zheng
Basic explanation of words
Zheng
lì
A black divine snake capable of making clouds and rain recorded in ancient books.
Big prawns.
Zheng
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Guang Yun" Lang Ji cut, go to Ji, come. ]
(1) The legendary snake.
(2) Big toad.
Zheng
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蜧; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1086 Page 18
[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Chen Ji cut, Yinli. [Jade articles] God snake also. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] The gods canthropias swim to sink. 【Zhang Jingyang Poems】The black scorpion jumps across the deep abyss. [Note] "Huainanzi" says: Sacrifice cattle and hair, suitable for sacrifice in temples. It can cause rain, not as black as the black horse. Gao You said: Heihu, snakes, hidden in the Shenquan, can cause clouds and rain. 【Liu Zongyuan·Qing Qingwen】Heily chrysanthemum, Yinyin chrysanthemum.　[Guangyun] Big Shrimp. Same as canthus. [Speaking text] canthus or chrysanthemum. Note see canthus.
Zheng
